ValidationRule.description: You cannot change the Peer Reviewer once the Peer Reviewer Approved field is set to "Yes" Updated 11/5/2019 Per NICC-038406
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'Hosted RFC',RecordType.Name = 'HRM RFC',RecordType.Name = 'PMS RFC'),ISPICKVAL(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c, "Yes"), ISCHANGED(Peer_Reviewer__c))
/* ORIGINAL CODE RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISPICKVAL(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c, "Yes") && ISCHANGED(Peer_Reviewer__c) */
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Peer Reviewer once the Peer Reviewer Approved field is set to "Yes"
